de.fuberlin.panda.metadata.result.fusion.helper

Class MatchingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fuberlin.panda.metadata.result.fusion.helper.MatchingHelper

  • public class MatchingHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a helper which contains two static methods to get the end of an given URI respectively the subUri which is every char from the beginning to the last occurrence of "/". It also provides a method to check if a List of String objects contains a string.
    Since:
    30.03.2014
    Author:
    Sebastian Schulz
    See Also:
    getUriEnding(URI), getSubUri(URI), #contains(List, String)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean contains(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> list, java.lang.String matching)
      Given a List of Strings and another String this method checks if the list contains this string.
      static java.lang.String getSubUri(java.net.URI uri)
      This method tries to match the given URI object against a Pattern called ENDING_PATTERN and so returns the first part of the given URI.
      static java.lang.String getUriEnding(java.net.URI uri)
      This method tries to match the given URI object against a Pattern called ENDING_PATTERN and so returns the last part of the given URI.
      static NoMetadataObject groupNoMetadataUris(java.util.List<java.net.URI> list)
      This method iterates the given list of URIs and creates a new NoMetadataObject the minimize the output.

    • Method Detail

      • getUriEnding

        public static java.lang.String getUriEnding(java.net.URI uri)
        This method tries to match the given URI object against a Pattern called ENDING_PATTERN and so returns the last part of the given URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - - a URI object.
        Returns:
        uriEnding - a String object representing the last part of the URI.

      • getSubUri

        public static java.lang.String getSubUri(java.net.URI uri)
        This method tries to match the given URI object against a Pattern called ENDING_PATTERN and so returns the first part of the given URI. This means the whole URI until the last appearance of "/".
        Parameters:
        uri - - a URI object.
        Returns:
        uriEnding - a String object representing the first part of the URI.

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> list,
               java.lang.String matching)
        Given a List of Strings and another String this method checks if the list contains this string.
        Parameters:
        list - - a List of String values.
        matching - - a String value which is checked to be contained in the list.
        Returns:
        a boolean value.

      • groupNoMetadataUris

        public static NoMetadataObject groupNoMetadataUris(java.util.List<java.net.URI> list)
        This method iterates the given list of URIs and creates a new NoMetadataObject the minimize the output.
        Parameters:
        list - - a List of URI values.
        Returns:
        noMetadata - a NoMetadataObject.
